reviewText: History class all over again.  It is not remotely appealing to watch - and I do enjoy documentaries.  It has a lot of info but not much else.

This is the consummate compendium of the American Civil War. It is very complete with period photographs,maps,and reenactments of the major battles- historically correct with casts of thousands. For fifteen hours and ten minutes you can completely immerse yourself in this great subject If there is only one complete course on the Civil War, this is it! Buy, Buy, Buy
Uninspired, but fairly adequate civil war documentaries. Low budget shows at some points.
Nice for anyone who enjoys facts about the Civil War.
I got this set very cheaply for my girlfriend. She watches a lot of history channel. She thought it was mediocre and kind of boring. Not sure if she watched the whole thing or not.
I love reading and seeing videos about the civil war. I haven't watched it yet but I know it will be interesting. Thanks.

purchased for my family to learn more abut Abraham Lincoln. learned alot of new information
about the President. highly suggest if you can get it on sale.
DVD collection arrived promptly and is a must for any Civil War buff.  It was a welcome addition to our dvd library.
I always wanted to have a set of dvd about the civil war and it came out as a good deal, thanks to Amazon..
Very dull, the same reenactment footage gets used tirelessly over and over. I lost count how many times I saw the same scene repeated. Waste of money.
